vocab.meaning: 沉湎於一種感覺或生活方式
（尤指經過努力）完成，達到，實現
（尤指為使某物更合適）；調整整理（衣著）

vocab.origin: Afford something or to do something

vocab.meaning: 期望，盼望；預見（並做準備）

vocab.origin: Appoint somebody as a position to do something
Argue for or in favour of or against something

vocab.meaning: 登上高的職位；升級，晉升
與（尤指他人不贊同的人）交往
（尤因值得讚賞的品質而）吸引，引起

vocab.origin: Attribute something to somebody or something

vocab.meaning: （用文字或圖像準確地）描繪，刻畫
（由於壓力、無力或缺乏支持）倒下
承諾，保證；投入（時間或金錢）

vocab.origin: Commit somebody to prison or hospital
Compete with or against somebody for something
Compete in a competition for something

vocab.meaning: 受人尊敬；受到高度評價
（尤指錢）貢獻；（給報紙、雜誌或書）投稿

vocab.origin: Co-operate with somebody in doing something

vocab.meaning: 準備和種植農作物；培育農作物
培養，改進；特別建立（關係）

vocab.origin: Declare something yourself to be noun or adjective

vocab.meaning: 留下；（在銀行或保險箱中）存放，儲存（尤指金錢）

vocab.origin: Despise somebody or something for something
Devote time, effort or love to somebody
Differ from somebody or between somebody and somebody in something
Beg to differ or disagree something
vocab.meaning: （禮貌的說法）恐怕我難以苟同
同意各自保留不同意見

vocab.origin: Discriminate against or in favour of somebody

vocab.meaning: 使自己出類拔萃，表現突出
發出回聲；重複；使産生似曾相識的感覺
開始，著手做（新的或重要的事情）
出現，露出；（從困境中）擺脫出來，存活下來
（尤指經過審查或訊問後）為人知曉，顯露

vocab.origin: Employ somebody as a position to do something

vocab.meaning: 邂逅，不期而遇，偶然碰到
遭遇，遇到（尤指不愉快的事情）
使服從（法律）；（強制）執行，把…加於
設立；創立；使得到承認；使被接受

vocab.origin: Establish yourself as a successful position

vocab.meaning: 超出（數量）；超越（規定的範圍）
存在；實際上有；（艱難）存活
（使）（尺寸、數量或重要性）擴大，增加
使某人遭受（有害或不快的遭遇）；使（某人）暴露於（險境）
陳述；表達；表露；快遞郵寄

vocab.origin: Fasten something on or to or together something

vocab.meaning: 提出，提請考慮（計劃或想法）

vocab.origin: Forbid somebody to do something or from doing something

vocab.meaning: 成功完成第一個大學學位

vocab.origin: Graduate from doing something to doing something

vocab.meaning: （常指在表達相反的意見之前表示讓步）承認，同意

vocab.origin: Take somebody or something for granted

vocab.meaning: 快速抓緊；領悟（尤指費解之事）
毫不猶豫地把握住（機會）

vocab.origin: Heal bad situation or painful emotion
vocab.meaning: （使）（壞的情況）好轉；（使）（情感上的傷口）癒合
（尤指用例子）說明；給（書籍、雜誌等）畫插圖

vocab.origin: Impose something on something for somebody

vocab.meaning: 把（尤指信仰或生活方式）強加於

vocab.origin: Impose on somebody to do something
Impress something on or upon somebody
vocab.meaning: 使（某人）明白…的重要性（或價值）
（寫在建築物的告示上）詳情請入內查詢
問候，詢問（尤指健康狀況）

vocab.origin: Invest something in something or doing something

vocab.meaning: 購買（認為有用的東西，即使貴）

vocab.origin: Invest somebody or something with something
vocab.meaning: 賦予…（權）以…，使…似乎具有（某種特徵）

vocab.origin: Manage something or to do something
vocab.meaning: 成功做到（尤指困難之事）
（以出眾的才華）引起（公眾）關注

vocab.origin: Nourish a felling, belief or plan

vocab.meaning: 獲得（尤指透過要求，購買，工作）
注意到；（為了學習）觀察，觀測

vocab.origin: Observe a law, rule or custom
Permit somebody something or to do something

vocab.meaning: （尤指因不停提問而）使煩惱，打攪

vocab.origin: Lodge a protest or complaint against something
a law or decision provide that ...
Punish somebody with a crime by something
Qualify somebody as a position to do something
Quote a price to do something

vocab.meaning: （尤指健康、能力、所有物等）失而復得

vocab.origin: Reduce somebody to something e.g. tears
vocab.meaning: 使…情緒低落；使…陷入困境

vocab.origin: Reduce something to something e.g. ruins, rubble

vocab.meaning: 認真思考（尤指可能性或意見）
使給人（尤指不好的）印象或評價
